info.author: JeanMichel FRANCOIS aka toutpt
info.description:
Introduction
============

This egg do not provide any new feature to plone. It add slimbox2 to Plone
and give official slimbox2 full release available throw browser resource directory slimbox2.

Version of slimbox2: 2.04

To install or upgrade, goto ZMI, portal_setup and run the
collective.js.slimbox2 setup step.


Credits
=======

Companies
---------

|makinacom|_

  * `Planet Makina Corpus <http://www.makina-corpus.org>`_
  * `Contact us <mailto:python@makina-corpus.org>`_


Authors

  - JeanMichel FRANCOIS aka toutpt <toutpt@gmail.com>

Contributors

  - Johannes RAGGAM aka thet <raggam-nl@adm.at>

.. |makinacom| image:: http://depot.makina-corpus.org/public/logo.gif
.. _makinacom:  http://www.makina-corpus.com

Changelog
=========

1.4 (2010-06-28)
----------------

- Add an slimbox2-overrides.css to properly reference images which weren't
  found before.
  [thet]

- Add an browserlayer, so that resources are only available if the
  browserlayer was registered.
  [thet]


1.3 (2010-06-17)
----------------

- CSS Profile wasn't included in last release....FIXED!
  [thet]


1.2 (2010-06-02)
----------------

- Change GS-Profile title to include the package name to better distinguish it
  from other packages.
  [thet]

- Remove title-attribute from jsregistry.xml. Products.ResourceRegistries 2
  doesn't expect it.
  [thet]

- Add cssregistry.xml to have slimbox2 css files registered and include in
  Plone theme.
  [thet]


1.1 (2010-06-02)
----------------

- Update to slimbox to 2.04
  [thet]

1.0 - Unreleased
----------------

- Initial release
info.name: collective.js.slimbox2
info.summary: Slimbox is a 4 KB visual clone of the popular Lightbox 2 script by Lokesh Dhakar, written using the jQuery javascript library.
info.html_description:
Introduction

This egg do not provide any new feature to plone. It add slimbox2 to Plone and give official slimbox2 full release available throw browser resource directory slimbox2.

Version of slimbox2: 2.04

To install or upgrade, goto ZMI, portal_setup and run the collective.js.slimbox2 setup step.

Credits

Companies

  • Planet Makina Corpus
  • Contact us

Authors

  • JeanMichel FRANCOIS aka toutpt <toutpt@gmail.com>

Contributors

  • Johannes RAGGAM aka thet <raggam-nl@adm.at>

Changelog

1.4 (2010-06-28)

  • Add an slimbox2-overrides.css to properly reference images which weren’t found before. [thet]
  • Add an browserlayer, so that resources are only available if the browserlayer was registered. [thet]

1.3 (2010-06-17)

  • CSS Profile wasn’t included in last release….FIXED! [thet]

1.2 (2010-06-02)

  • Change GS-Profile title to include the package name to better distinguish it from other packages. [thet]
  • Remove title-attribute from jsregistry.xml. Products.ResourceRegistries 2 doesn’t expect it. [thet]
  • Add cssregistry.xml to have slimbox2 css files registered and include in Plone theme. [thet]

1.1 (2010-06-02)

  • Update to slimbox to 2.04 [thet]

1.0 - Unreleased

  • Initial release
